pages.text: $(li)Quartz Block is a new decorative block.$(br)$(li)It can be used to save Quartz in a more efficient way.$(br)$(li)Masons will exchange your Emeralds by Quartz Blocks.

$(li)You can use Quartz blocks to craft Quartz Pillars, Quartz Walls, Quartz Bricks, Quartz Slabs, or Quartz Stairs in a Crafting Table.$(br)$(li)You can make a Smooth Quartz Block Smelting a Block of Quartz in a Furnace, Baking, or Kiln.$(br)$(li)You can place it in a Stonecutter to make new decorative blocks.
